soen6441.team01.warzone.controller

Class GamePlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.controller.GamePlayController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGamePlayController, IGameplayOrderDatasource

    public class GamePlayController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGamePlayController, IGameplayOrderDatasource
    Warzone game play controller. Manages the coordination and progression of the game play phase.

        public IOrderModel getOrder(IPlayerModel l_player_clone)

      • processGamePlayCommand

        public IOrderModel processGamePlayCommand(java.lang.String p_cmd,
                                          IPlayerModel l_player_clone)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Process the game play command:
        • showmap
        • deploy countryID num_reinforcements
        • exit
        • help
        Parameters:
        p_cmd - user full command
        l_player_clone - the player to get and process commands for
        Returns:
        the order, null = order not fulfilled - try again
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error
